keyword: calories in egg and sausage mcmuffin
title: Calories in Egg and Sausage McMuffin
meta_description: Discover calories in egg and sausage mcmuffin, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, fat, carbs, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in Egg and Sausage McMuffin
assumptions: Standard McDonald's Sausage McMuffin with Egg: English muffin, pork sausage patty, folded egg, American cheese; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and custom orders. Values based on standard U.S. McDonald's data; check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: One Egg and Sausage McMuffin has 480 kcal, 21 g protein, and 30 g carbs.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in an egg and sausage McMuffin?
faqs.a: Approximately 480 kcal for the standard version.

faqs.q: What's the protein in egg and sausage McMuffin?
faqs.a: About 21 g of protein per mcmuffin.

faqs.q: Does egg and sausage McMuffin have trans fats?
faqs.a: 0 g trans fat in the standard recipe.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in egg and sausage McMuffin?
Can I make egg and sausage McMuffin lower calorie?
faqs.a: Yes, remove cheese or swap sausage for turkey to cut ~50-100 kcal.
